verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] commuted the sentence of Alice Marie Johnson who has been in prison for the lats 21 years serving a life sentence .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: commuted] [ARG1: the sentence of Alice Marie Johnson who has been in prison for the lats 21 years serving a life sentence] .
President Donald Trump has commuted the sentence of Alice Marie Johnson who [V: has] been in prison for the lats 21 years serving a life sentence .
President Donald Trump has commuted the sentence of [ARG1: Alice Marie Johnson] [R-ARG1: who] has [V: been] [ARG2: in prison for the lats 21 years serving a life sentence] .
President Donald Trump has commuted the sentence of Alice Marie Johnson [ARG0: who] has been in prison for the lats 21 years [V: serving] [ARG1: a life sentence] .
